concept.title: Tips for Expression Completion
concept.shortdesc: Use the following information and tips when you invoke expression completion:

ol.li: expression completiontipsField names display at the top of the list when data preview is available.
When defined, pipeline constants display in the list with a purple Contants icon:

To invoke expression completion, place the cursor where you want to create an expression and click Ctrl + Spacebar.
A list of expression elements valid at that location displays. Scroll to view the entire list.

To view more information about an element, click the element name:
Is it possible to show the value for a pipeline constant when you click it? Also, is it possible to show the data type of a field when you select it? It would be nice if we could provide a little more info for those elements?
To add an element, double-click the element name.
To view the syntax of a function, after you add the function, click within the parentheses.
You can invoke expression completion at any location to view the valid expression elements.Should I add anything to this list?
